name: Storm Crow
flavorText: "When the sky was torn from the sea, Storm Crow appeared from within the thundering clouds to grant mankind dominion over the living flame." —Legends of the Forgotten World
flavorTextHtml: "When the sky was torn from the sea, Storm Crow appeared from within the thundering clouds to grant mankind dominion over the living flame." —Legends of the Forgotten World

primary.textHtml: Lightning skills deal [15 - 20]% more damage.

secondary.textHtml: 27% chance to cast a fiery ball when attacking. [20 - 40]%
